Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland and Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Foster, Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland, Foster and Damen due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Foster, Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland, Foster, then resume their normal route on Damen due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to a signal problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to a signal problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
